text: David J. Arnold Jr. (December 7, 1971 - January 17, 2021) was an American politician and lawyer. He was born in Lebanon County, Pennsylvania. Arnold was a member of the Pennsylvania State Senate from 2020 until his death. He was a member of the Republican Party. Arnold was diagnosed with brain cancer in October 2019. He died on January 17, 2021 in Lebanon County from the disease at the age of 49. ==References== Category:1971 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from brain cancer Category:Cancer deaths in Pennsylvania Category:Members of the Pennsylvania General Assembly Category:Lawyers from Pennsylvania Category:Politicians from Pennsylvania Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Dave Arnold (politician)
